    Journal #2

    less than 1 minute read

    As college approaches,

    for the past week, here I've sat reading,

    writing, staring at walls, and thinking-

    Life doesn't care for me,

    nor should I care for it.

    Instead, I just need to laugh at it.

    Laugh as it steals what I had stolen,

    and slowly, but inevitably,

    takes me back home to dust.

    Tags: College, death, Poetry

    Categories: Journal, Writing

    Updated: August 13, 2014
